Content:: The 2022 La Flèche Wallonne is a road cycling one-day race that took place on 20 April 2022 from the Belgian city of Blegny to the municipality of Huy. It was the 86th edition of La Flèche Wallonne and the 16th event of the 2022 UCI World Tour. It was won for the first time by Dylan Teuns.[2] Twenty-five teams were invited to the race, including all nineteen UCI WorldTeams and six UCI ProTeams.[3] UCI WorldTeams UCI ProTeams a As of 1 March 2022, the UCI announced that cyclists from Russia and Belarus would no longer compete under the name or flag of those respective countries due to the Russian invasion of Ukraine.[5]
